name: Nightly Garbage Run
subtitle: Rocket's Secret Machine

historicalClassification.note: Originally printed as a Trainer. Would be classified as Item by modern rules. Part of the 'Rocket's Secret Machine' series.

effect.text: Choose up to 3 Basic Pok√©mon cards, Evolution cards, and/or basic Energy cards from your discard pile. Show them to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.

tips: Recycle knocked out Pokemon for another use
Recover basic Energy for continued attacking
Use to recycle key evolution lines

competitiveHistory: Nightly Garbage Run became a staple recovery card in many decks. Its flexibility to recover any combination of Pokemon and basic Energy made it invaluable for maintaining resources throughout a game. The artwork humorously depicted robots collecting discarded items at night.

rulings.ruling: You can choose any combination of Basic Pokemon, Evolution cards, and basic Energy cards, up to 3 total.
Special Energy cards are not basic Energy cards and cannot be recovered with this card.
The cards are shuffled into your deck, not put into your hand.
